ivardefs.name: addItem_
ivardefs.desc: The first-tier service adjudications for payor added product or service lines.

ivardefs.name: communicationRequest_
ivardefs.desc: Request for additional supporting or authorizing information.

ivardefs.name: created
ivardefs.desc: The date this resource was created.

ivardefs.name: disposition
ivardefs.desc: A human readable description of the status of the adjudication.

ivardefs.name: error_
ivardefs.desc: Errors encountered during the processing of the adjudication.

ivardefs.name: form
ivardefs.desc: The actual form, by reference or inclusion, for printing the content or an EOB.

ivardefs.name: formCode
ivardefs.desc: A code for the form to be used for printing the content.

ivardefs.name: fundsReserve
ivardefs.desc: A code, used only on a response to a preauthorization, to indicate whether the benefits payable have been reserved and for whom.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: A unique identifier assigned to this claim response.

ivardefs.name: insurance_
ivardefs.desc: Financial instruments for reimbursement for the health care products and services specified on the claim.

ivardefs.name: insurer
ivardefs.desc: The party responsible for authorization, adjudication and reimbursement.

ivardefs.name: item_
ivardefs.desc: A claim line. Either a simple (a product or service) or a 'group' of details which can also be a simple items or groups of sub-details.

ivardefs.name: outcome
ivardefs.desc: The outcome of the claim, predetermination, or preauthorization processing.

ivardefs.name: patient
ivardefs.desc: The party to whom the professional services and/or products have been supplied or are being considered and for whom actual for facast reimbursement is sought.

ivardefs.name: payeeType
ivardefs.desc: Type of Party to be reimbursed: subscriber, provider, other.

ivardefs.name: payment
ivardefs.desc: Payment details for the adjudication of the claim.

ivardefs.name: preAuthPeriod
ivardefs.desc: The time frame during which this authorization is effective.

ivardefs.name: preAuthRef
ivardefs.desc: Reference from the Insurer which is used in later communications which refers to this adjudication.

ivardefs.name: processNote_
ivardefs.desc: A note that describes or explains adjudication results in a human readable form.

ivardefs.name: request
ivardefs.desc: Original request resource reference.

ivardefs.name: requestor
ivardefs.desc: The provider which is responsible for the claim, predetermination or preauthorization.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the resource instance.

ivardefs.name: subType
ivardefs.desc: A finer grained suite of claim type codes which may convey additional information such as Inpatient vs Outpatient and/or a specialty service.

ivardefs.name: total_
ivardefs.desc: Categorized monetary totals for the adjudication.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: A finer grained suite of claim type codes which may convey additional information such as Inpatient vs Outpatient and/or a specialty service.

ivardefs.name: use
ivardefs.desc: A code to indicate whether the nature of the request is: to request adjudication of products and services previously rendered; or requesting authorization and adjudication for provision in the future; or requesting the non-binding adjudication of the list

properties.desc: This resource provides the adjudication details from the processing of a Claim resource.
